mapper.insert: insert into com_free(mem_no, com_free_subject, com_free_content, com_free_count) values(#{mem_no},#{com_free_subject},#{com_free_content},#{com_free_count})
mapper.update: update com_free set mem_no=#{mem_no}, com_free_subject=#{com_free_subject},com_free_content=#{com_free_content}, com_free_count=#{com_free_count} where com_free_no=#{com_free_no}
mapper.select: select * from com_free where com_free_no>0 order by com_free_no desc, com_free_regdate desc
